name: Vacuum Wars
description:
Two vacuums, each controlled by one human player. They both have one goal in common: competing against each other to collect as much trash as possible in 60 seconds. Outwit and outsmart your opponent to win!

This game was inspired by the "Chiritorie" minigame from WarioWare: Mega Microgame$!, which featured an obscure Nintendo product called the Chiritorie.

CONTROLS:

Player 1 (Red Vacuum) Move Forward: Left Shift

Player 2 (Blue Vacuum) Move Forward: Right Shift
